Name: Shabti box
Description: A pylon-shaped shabti box of sycamore wood belonging to the official Khennem, whose title was 'Overseer of Followers'. The lid of the box is divided into three sections by upright pieces of wood but the box itself remains undivided. The deceased and his wife are shown worshipping the gods Re-Harakhty and Maat on one side and Osiris and Isis on the other.
